participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, Emily has a soft spot for animals and enjoys having meaningful conversations.
participant_1.background: I am near sighted and wear contact lenses. I have trouble losing weight. I love animals. I don't cook and usually eat out.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and expressive, Jordan has a unique fashion sense and appreciates the little things in life.
participant_2.background: I don't have a relationship with my deadbeat dad. I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses. I flirted with the dmv officer in order to pass my driving exam. I want to visit rome, but I can't make myself go alone. The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years.

content.text: I'm near sighted and wear contact lenses.
I still like combat boots with babydoll dresses.
I love animals.
I want to visit rome, but I can't make myself go alone.
I don't cook and usually eat out.
I don't have a relationship with my deadbeat dad.
I flirted with the dmv officer in order to pass my driving exam.
The death of Kurt Cobain marred my middle school years.
That's really cool that you still like combat boots with babydoll dresses. I think that's a really interesting look.
Thanks! I think it's pretty unique too.
What's your favorite animal?
I think my favorite animal is the fox. They're so cute and sly.
I love foxes too! They're so adorable.
Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets right now. I want to get a dog one day, but I'm not sure if I'm ready for the responsibility yet.
I have a cat named Mittens. She's a really sweet cat.
I love cats! They're so cuddly and cute.
Yeah, they're the best.
I'm glad we met. You seem really cool.
Thanks! I'm glad I met you too.
